document_data.name: ''Harp of Healing''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''harp of healing''''' was a variety of [[harp]] imbued with restorative [[magic]].
document_data.Powers:
This harp would gradually heal any wounded creature within {{SI|10|ft|long=yes}} of it when played. This could be done for eight consecutive hours before a [[bard]] began to seriously risk misplaying it.

If the playing of the harp ceased for whatever reason, it would not continue healing affected creatures until they became wounded again.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Brond Carlow]], a bard in [[Ravens Bluff]], owned one of these harps.<ref>{{Cite polyhedron/78/The Living City: Arts' Haven|18}}
